A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a sensational\, sophisticated\, and satisfying blockbuster! Star Wars: The Last Jedi reminded me why I loved Star Wars to begin with and knocked me out of my Star Wars apathy that I'd been experiencing for over a year. Rian Johnson clearly understands The Force better than any other filmmaker who has ever touched this franchise\, and the story presents a compelling deconstructionist tale of deification\, legacy\, failure\, and redemption all under a smart meta-narrative which weaves its many subplots into a whole.
